title: Kipps AI
description: Kipps AI innovates customer support and lead generation. With the power of LLMs, your customers get 24/7 support. Automates redundant customer queries and redirects the leads generated to the appropriate team or team member based on the intent. Transform your website into an interactive powerhouse with Kipps AI! Revolutionize customer support and lead generation with 24/7 assistance and personalized intent-based responses.
